r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Added CHM output format. (Rudy) - Added KDevelop (Index & Table of contents) output theme. (Rudy) - Added Man page output format. (Rudy) - Added support for phpdoc:exception. (Hannes)
